BackstoryDef.title: shadow initiate
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was groomed for military service by an interstellar shadow government. [PAWN_pronoun] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] youth in deep space practicing combat simulations aboard a mothership.

BackstoryDef.title: shadow marine
BackstoryDef.description: After graduating at the top of [PAWN_possessive] class, [PAWN_nameDef] was given a special task force and deployed throughout deep space. [PAWN_possessive] squad carried out coups, political assassinations, and false flag terrorist attacks to weaken local governments.\n\nAfter a lifetime of loyal service to the shadow government, [PAWN_nameDef] was deemed a liability and left for dead aboard a decrepit startstation.

BackstoryDef.title: vatgrown chemist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was grown to be a perfect chemist, with a mind perfectly tuned for creating illicit drugs. [PAWN_possessive] creators planned to use [PAWN_objective] to create an interstellar drug cartel, but [PAWN_pronoun] managed to sneak away on an outbound cargo ship.
